name: Amazon Prime Video
desc: Enjoy exclusive Amazon Originals as well as popular movies and TV shows. Watch anytime, anywhere.

name: Crunchyroll
desc: Embark on an anime adventure with Crunchyroll, your ultimate destination for watching a vast collection of anime series and movies.

name: Curiosity Stream
desc: Curiosity Stream has thousands of documentaries that enlighten, entertain & inspire. What are you curious about?

name: Disney+
desc: Disney+ is the exclusive home for your favorite movies and TV shows from Disney, Pixar, Marvel, Star Wars, and National Geographic. Start streaming today.

name: ESPN+
desc: Stream exclusive live sports from UFC, Baseball, College Basketball, Soccer, Golf, and more.

name: Fubo
desc: Fubo is the world's only sports-focused live TV streaming service with top leagues and teams, plus popular shows, movies and news for the entire household.

name: Netflix
desc: Watch Netflix movies & TV shows online or stream right to your smart TV, game console, PC, Mac, mobile, tablet and more.

name: Peacock
desc: Take a Look at Peacock. Stream tons of hit shows, new movies, exclusive Originals, live sports, WWE and news.

name: Plex
desc: Plex allows you to manage, curate, and stream your personal media along with premium content. Enjoy your own content on all your devices wherever you are

name: Twitch
desc: Twitch is the world's leading live streaming platform for gamers and the things we love. Watch and chat now with millions of other fans from around the world.

name: YouTube
desc: Enjoy the videos and music you love, upload original content, and share it all with friends, family, and the world on YouTube.

name: YouTube Music
desc: A new music service with official albums, singles, videos, remixes, live performances and more for Android, iOS and desktop. It's all here.
